scripts.electron:serve:file: vuelectro clean && vue-cli-service build --mode=development && vuelectro compilemain && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=devprod electron app/electron-main.js
scripts.electron:prod: vuelectro clean && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=build vue-cli-service build && vuelectro compilemain && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=prod NODE_ENV=production electron app/electron-main.js
